description: This file defines a React functional component called Login, which provides a user authentication interface with email and password inputs, leveraging React hooks, context, and routing for login functionality.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form with email & password inputs, handling login process, error display, and redirection upon success.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission that performs user login and navigates to the dashboard on success.
